about_the_game:
The NewImages DLC gives you access to the official curated selection of the 2022 edition of the festival. It will be operational from 8th - 12th of June and you will be able to access the following:

6DoF
Child of Empire (European Premiere)
Cosmogonic (World Premiere)

Kubo Walks the City (French Premiere)
Lavrynthos (French Premiere)
Madame Pirate: Becoming a Legend (European Premiere)
Red Tail ep. 1 (International Premiere)

3DoF
Child of Empire (European Premiere)
Madame Pirate: Becoming a Legend (European Premiere)
Reflected City

Please join us once more in Alexandria, to explore the world, connect with others and view stellar immersive experiences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 8th gen intel i5 processor or AMD Ryzen 5 3500
  • Graphics: Nvideia GTX 1070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 10th gen intel i5 or AMD Ryzen 3600X
  • Graphics: Nvideia GTX 3070 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
